title: Andrew Bartnik
text: I’m an aspiring Data Scientist currently enrolled in the Masters of Environmental Data Science program at the University of California, Santa Barbara. I’m particularly interested in using machine learning techniques on large scale phenomena. I will be posting my data projects here as I complete them. Thanks for visiting!
